person.persName: Thomas G. Thornton (Campbell County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Sarah J Thornton. Father of Mary T Thornton, Louis B Thornton, James T Thornton. Carpenter in Campbell County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned 2 enslaved persons in Campbell County in 1850.
